name: The Chess Board
description: Find the correct pieces and their positions on the chess board to solve the puzzle.

hints.name: First Hint
hints.text: It seems like there are multiple ways to find a solution. Do not only look at the text. What else can you see on the paper?

hints.name: Second Hint
hints.text: The chess pieces needed are a knight(horse) and a rook(tower). You should also pay attention to the bold words in the riddle. One hides only the letter the other one does hide the whole position

hints.name: Third Hint
hints.text: For the symbols. For one you have to see what it sounds like when you say it out loud. The other one represents a letter. Also pay attention to the box the symbols are in
